name.tooltip: The name of the variable. Has to start with a `$` sign.

value.tooltip: The initial value of the variable

onChange.tooltip:
An ODT script that gets executed each time the ODT query for this variable returns a different value. The `onChange` script is executed
with two additonal variables: `$oldValue` and `$newValue`. Those contain the previous and the current value of the ODT query result.
